text.__SUMMARY__: Guzmania conifera is a plant species in the genus Guzmania. This species is native to Ecuador and Peru.
text.Cultivars:
Guzmania 'Candy Corn'
Guzmania 'Equator'
Guzmania 'Graaf Van Hoorn'
Guzmania 'Lollipop'
Guzmania 'Torch'
text.References:
Catalogue of Vascular Plants of Ecuador Retrieved 12 October 2009
